name: Auclair Avalon Ragwool Flip Mitts - Men's
description: These soft-top convertible ragg wool mitts change into fingerless gloves so you can stay warm regardless of how you wear them.Made of warm ragg wool with nylon for durability.Sturdy, pigskin-suede leather palms.Insulated with Thinsulate® synthetic insulation that is warm even when wet.Sewn-in liners are made of soft fleece.Double-knit, ribbed cuffs.Flip the tops to turn them into fingerless gloves for extra dexterity.
